Speaker: eve
Dialogue: [Hey watch it! Don't come any closer!]

Speaker: john
Dialogue: Here, take the cup. Take the cup -- Whoa!

Speaker: steward
Dialogue: Please remain stationary. A service-bot will be here to assist you momentarily.

Speaker: nanny-bot
Dialogue: "A"! "A" is for "Axiom", your home sweet home. "B"! "B" is for "Buy N Large", your very best friend...

Speaker: mary
Dialogue: Date?!  Don't get me started! Every holo-date I've been on has been a virtual disaster! If I could just meet one who wasn't so superficial. There are no good men out there!...

Speaker: mary
Dialogue: Huh? Oh, uh, sure go ahead.

Speaker: mary
Dialogue: I didn't know we had a pool!

Speaker: autopilot
Dialogue: Captain. You are needed on the bridge.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Protocol, Auto. First things first.  Computer, status report.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: 12:30?!  Auto, why didn't you wake me for the morning announcements?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Honestly, it's the one thing I get to do on this ship.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: But...no probe's ever come back positive...  ...before.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Wow... Will you look at that?

Speaker: eve
Dialogue: [Wall-E, what are you doing here?! You can't be here! You're going to get me in trouble!...]

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Well, let's open her up. Step One. Voice command, "Confirm Acquisition."

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Plant. Right. Right. Where is it?  Maybe we missed a step. Show me how you change the text again...

Speaker: autopilot
Dialogue: Contains no specimen. Probe's memory is faulty.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: So, then...we're NOT going to Earth?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: So, uh, I guess things go back to normal, huh?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: The probe must be defective. Gopher, send her to the Repair Ward.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Have them run diagnostics on her. Make sure she's not malfunctioning -- EEYAH!!

Speaker: ship's computer
Dialogue: Analysis: foreign contaminant. Substance is a three phase system composed of various combinations of naturally derived solids. Subject is most commonly referred to as "soil", "dirt", or "earth".

Speaker: ship's computer
Dialogue: "Earth" - the surface of the world as distinct from the sky or sea.

Speaker: ship's computer
Dialogue: ...an expanse of salt water that covers most of the Earth's surface and surrounds its land masses...

Speaker: ship's computer
Dialogue: Ten, nine, eight, seven, six, five, four, three, two...

Speaker: mary
Dialogue: Oooh...  Hey, that's what's his name --

Speaker: john
Dialogue: Hey... I know that guy! It's, uh...  Wall-E! Hey Wall-E! It's your buddy, John!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Auto! Earth is amazing!  These are called "farms". Humans would put seeds in the ground, pour water on them, and they'd grow food, like, pizza --

Speaker: john
Dialogue: I didn't know we had a pool.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: [Rocket noises] Prepare for landing... [Landing noises] We're here everybody! Yeah, Captain! [crowd cheers] Captain we're home! It's so beautiful! [crowd cheers]...No it's nothing. I was pleased to do it. It's all about you people --

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: We can go back home...for the first time!  What's it like now?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: No, no! Don't tell me! I want to see for myself!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Wait...that doesn't look like Earth... Where's the blue sky...

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: ...I know that song...  And they're... dancing. Yes, dancing!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: ...You made it somehow, eh little guy? You didn't give up, did you?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: There you go little guy. You came a long way for a drink of water... Just needed someone to look after you, that's all --

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Auto, Eve found the plant. Fire up the Holo-detector.

Speaker: autopilot
Dialogue: Not necessary, Captain. You may give it to me.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: You know what? I should do it myself.

Speaker: autopilot
Dialogue: Sir, I insist you give me the plant.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Auto, get out of my way.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: What are you talking about? Why not?

Speaker: autopilot
Dialogue: That is classified. Captain, give me the plant.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: What do you mean, "classified"? You don't keep secrets from the Captain!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Tell me, Auto! That's an order!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: No, wait a minute. Computer, when was that message sent to the Axiom?

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: That's -- that's nearly 700 years ago!! Auto, things have changed! We've got to go back!

Speaker: autopilot
Dialogue: Sir, orders are: "Do not return to Earth".

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: But life is sustainable now! Look at this plant, green and growing! It's living proof he was wrong.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: What?! It's completely relevant!  Out there is our home! Home, Auto! And it's in trouble! I can't just sit here and...and...do nothing! That's all I've done! That's all anyone on this blasted ship has ever done...NOTHING!!

Speaker: autopilot
Dialogue: On the Axiom you will survive.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: I DON'T WANT TO SURVIVE! I WANT TO LIVE!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: I'm the Captain of the Axiom. We are going home today!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Hey! That's my plant. This is mutiny!  Eve, arrest him!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Eve, you are to put this plant straight in the Holo-detector.

Speaker: autopilot
Dialogue: All communications are terminated. You are confined to quarters.

Speaker: steward
Dialogue: Please hold. We are currently having technical difficul -- !

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Mutinyyy...Mute...neee...This is your last chance...Auto...You hear me?...Stupid...wheel...

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: What too heavy for ya, huh?!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: You're not getting away from me, one-eye! -- OOF! -- Is that all you got?!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Ladies and Gentlemen! This is your Captain speaking! We're having a slight malfunction with the Autopilot! Please remain calm!

Speaker: mary
Dialogue: John, get ready to have some kids!

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: Auto, you are relieved of duty.

Speaker: ship's computer
Dialogue: Nine, eight, seven, six, five, four, three, two, one, zero.

Speaker: captain
Dialogue: This is called "farming"! You kids are going to grow all kinds of plants: vegetable plants, pizza plants!  Ahh, it's good to be home...
